results.name: a(0)=0, a(1)=5 and a(n) = 22*a(n-1) - a(n-2) + 10 for n > 1.
link: Colin Barker, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..700
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (23,-23,1).
program: (PARI) concat(0, Vec(5*x*(1 + x) / ((1 - x)*(1 - 22*x + x^2)) + O(x^20))) \\ _Colin Barker_, Dec 24 2018
